name: 3D Horse Racing
description:
3D Horse Racing. Race Your Horse Collecting Blue and Green Flags. Penalties Added For Riding on Grass Verges and Hitting Fences. How Fast Can You Complete Circuit? 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time. Controls to Move Left and Right. Up Control to Accelerate.

• Race Your Horse Collecting Blue and Green Flags.
• Penalties Added For Riding on Grass Verges and Hitting Fences.
• How Fast Can You Complete Circuit?
• 7 Dashboard Clocks Show Stats. Shows Last Lap Time.
• No In-App Purchases
